name: Labyrinth Cross Blood
description:
Meikyuu Cross Blood (迷宮クロスブラッド), a.k.a. Labyrinth Xross Blood, is a first-person dungeon crawler developed and published by Experience Inc. on December 23, 2010 for Windows. Meikyuu Cross Blood is the fourth and latest installment of the Generation Xth series.

The game has been faithfully ported to the Xbox 360 in Japan on November 10, 2011 under the title Meikyuu Cross Blood: Reloaded. It was later re-released for the PS Vita, respectively in 2013 and 2014.
